      java.lang.Float UpdateDistance​(java.lang.Long currentNode, java.lang.Long goalNode, java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.util.List<Segment>> completeMap)
      Function allowing to know whether it is shorter to access the goalNode from the currentNode In other words, compares the distance from source of the goalNode with the distance from source of the currentNode + the distance between these two consecutive Nodes

      • UpdateDistance

        public java.lang.Float UpdateDistance​(java.lang.Long currentNode,
                                      java.lang.Long goalNode,
                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.util.List<Segment>> completeMap)
        Function allowing to know whether it is shorter to access the goalNode from the currentNode In other words, compares the distance from source of the goalNode with the distance from source of the currentNode + the distance between these two consecutive Nodes
        Parameters:
        currentNode -
        goalNode -
        completeMap -
        Returns:
        -1 if the current distance from source of the goal Node is shorter, the newly calculated distance from source otherwise.

      • createPathIds

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Long> createPathIds​(java.lang.Long origin,
                                                    java.lang.Long destination)
        Function that creates the shortestPath between an origin and a destination. This path is an array of ID of intersection
        Parameters:
        origin -
        destination -
        Returns:
        List the ordered list of ID of intersection to visit to run the shortest path
